name: Space Darrel Official
description:
WASD is to move but only worry about "A" and "D"

Space to jump 

Left mouse click to shoot! 

Kill "Steve The Sociable" (Fat Cat) if you touch enemies both you and them take a hit so if they disappear it means you killed them! but there is no healing as of yet! so be slow and careful!! your goal is to unlock the pink doors in the middle row by touching the white orbs around the map! I won't hold your hand so figure out how to move around the map and try not to die! goodluck!
